One of Eggsy's balloons bursts. POP! Roxy loses one Up in the tower, Ulrich is taking pot shots at everyone.. But now he’s the prime target. From their various locatio every candidate now has his or her sights trained on Ulri Everyone fires. POP! POP! Both of Ulrich’s balloons go... Then he is HIT in the chest. He FALLS from the tower. ANOTHER KLAXON sounds. It’s over. Everyone runs over to w Ulrich is lying, groaning. Merlin approaches, too.
Medic! We need a medic!

No we don’t. Unlike Churchill’s jumpsuits, ours have Kevlar woven into them. The fall probably hurt more than the shot. Just as well you were the first to lose both balloons, Ulxich. You can recuperate at home instead of our sick bay. And Anton? That was your bullet, so pack your bags.
dgack is in a sick bay bed. Merlin is here, and they’re watching a screen playing footage of Professor Swanson’s exploding, in super-slow motion, on a loop.
You felt heat?
Heat. Yes. But mostly pain.
Are you familiar with pyroclastic density currents?
Something to do with volcanoes?
Exactly. Superheated gas and matter. Stand downwind in the wrong conditions and your brain can cook fast enough to shatter the skull.  48.
Right. Only there was no superheated gas and matter. Just an unoccupied room with a very agitated academic in it.
I’m told even academics contain fluid and soft tissue. Question is, how did it get superheated? Arthur enters.
How are we? Shaken and stirred?
Never been better.
Four broken ribs, multiple lacerations and concussion. Needs to stay at least forty eight hours.

Still significantly healthier than poor old Professor Swanson. Who perished in a tragic gas leak, by the way. There was talk of an autopsy, but I dealt with it. So, what do we have? (looking at the screen) Good grief. On the screen, Swanson’s head slowly explodes again.

I ran a communications trace. The Prof received a blank text to his mobile. Just before his head blew. Merlin touches the screen. The video freezes. It’s at an especially amazing moment in the earliest stage of explos Merlin points to the blue-tooth earpiece Swanson is weari
Swanson's phone earpiece. Rigged to deliver intense heat directly into the ear canal. Triggered by a text.
Let's trace that text. ASAP.
A large venue somewhere in coastal Italy. ELTON JOHN is j finishing a performance on stage. The huge CROWD going wi  69 70 7 49.
By the stage door, a LIMO waits. Elton John forges toward through a crowd of FANS, assisted by TWO VENUE SECURITY G
Elton gets in and the car pulls away. Now, his eyes widen Gazelle is sitting opposite him.
Who the fuck are you?! (seeing Gazelle’s legs) Sorry, but this is my fucking car -- {to the driver) Stop! Driver! Stop! Parlo Inglese?! Fucking stop!
No need. My boss is staying at a Villa just along the coast. He's dying to meet you. Elton is about to unleash hell, then he sees Gazelle’s GU
Oh fucking hell. I’m going to fucking die now, aren't I? Gazelle takes a bottle of SODA from the ice bucket.
No way. My boss adores you. Drink?
Three empty beds in here now, the mattresses bare. Eggsy on his bed, exhausted, playing with his dog. Everyone els playing charades. Roxy's up.
A play! Three words! Whole thing! Roxy mimes sitting, checking her watch, tapping her foot.
Troilus et Cressida!
Waiting for Godot!
Yes! Charlie got it!  72 73 50.
How the hell would that have been Troilus and Cressida?! Everyone LAUGHS. Eggsy looks over, totally excluded.

All the dogs sit obediently in a neat line. Watching... The recruits scale the side of the building. Clearly they using the same special purple resin we saw Jack use earli Eggsy is doing well. Saba is struggling. Merlin shouts up

Remember: relax to release, tense to hold. The resin responds to your neurotransmitter chemicals. Saba's hands peel away from the building and she falls... Lands heavily on the ground. The dogs run over and sniff MERLIN (CONT‘D) That'll do for today. Saba -- pack your bags. Everyone else, wash your hands, then straight to room nine. Everyone gets down, hurries off. Eggsy stops to help Saba She’s clutching her back, in some pain from her fall.
Leave me. Go wash your hands. Eggsy wipes his hands on his trousers, smiles at her and his arm around her for support her as she limps slowly ba

Eggsy, Roxy, Charlie, Henri, Omar, Rufus and Kenji sit anxiously in SPECIAL CHAIRS with HANDLES on the arm rests They grab their handles and exchange uneasy looks. Merlin moves over to a PULL SWITCH on the wall.

First to let go goes home. Merlin throws the switch. Everyone reacts in AGONY. Teeth gritted, spines arching. Rufus lets go of the handles and leaps up out of his seat While the others continue to endure their suffering, Merl points to the door and Rufus leaves, ashamed.  Sl. Roxy and Eggsy are side by side, Roxy slumped, hair damp.
No, I'm done. Roxy looks over to him, shakes her head, unable to speak. Eggsy tries to remove his hands from the handles... But t are glued there by the resin he failed to remove earlier.

Shit. One by one, the others let go: Kenji... Omar... Eggsy tries again to remove his hands, but he can’t. Henri lets go... Then Roxy... Just Eggsy and Charlie now. The others watch them intentl Eggsy starts howling, writhing in his chair. Charlie grits his teeth... But can’t take it. He lets go. A split second later, Eggsy passes out. Merlin throws the switch. Eggsy is slumped forward, not moving. Roxy rushes for him checks his carotid pulse. Charlie saunters over and yanks arm. Eggsy's hand remains stuck to the handle. Charlie grabs Eggsy’s hand and peels it carefully away fr the handle. He holds up Eggsy’s limp hand in angry triump The palm is covered in purple resin.
He cheated! Look!
He won. Take him to the sick bay.
This better not get him out of the general knowledge test tomorrow.
Eggsy wakes up in the sick bay. He looks around to see hi dog asleep on the end of his bed... And Jack in the next
It’s not normally this crowded.
What are you doing here? You okay?  52.

Excellent, thanks. No... Actually, not so excellent. Worried. About you. About throwing you into this situation. And how you've been treated by the others. So: guilty. Rather unhappy and guilty. or is that “TMI” as you young folk say? EGosy I've never said “TMI”.
It means “too much information.”
I know... Listen, don’t stress. You gave me a chance. I‘m just sorry I ain’t gonna make it. Tomorrow I’m out of here for having “F.A.I”.
What?
“Fuck all information”. We’ve got the general knowledge test. (spotting Jack’s Ipad) Actually, can I borrow your Ipad? I could revise a bit.
(handing it over) I'm impressed. That shows spirit. Determination.

It shows blind fucking optimism. That lot have had years of the best education money can buy and I’m pissing around on the internet like I can catch up in a few hours. Arthur and Merlin enter. Arthur looks at Eggsy.
What‘s he do:ing here? Get him out.
It's okay. He's trustworthy. Arthur shrugs and Merlin activates the SCREEN by Jack’s b A photo appears: Valentine.
Ta da. Richmond Valentine. Philanthropist and tech billionaire.  53.
I know him! Their phones are shit. Jack, Arthur and Merlin look at him sharply.
Shut up, Eggsy. (to Merli Wait, you traced the text to him personally? Or to his company?

It came from a number registered to a charitable foundation he runs. Climate change research. Billions of dollars went through it over the last decade, then for the last two years, nothing. And not a single current registered employee. Either he lost interest in saving the earth or we're looking at a major tax dodge that's never been investigated.
This fellow is extremely well- connected. Well placed to pursue his own agenda, whatever it may be.
Whatever it is, he considered Professor Swanson’s life a fair price for keeping it quiet. Any further updates on the other abductions?
We’re up to twenty three at the last count. Scientists, doctors, academics. No obvious link with Swanson or Valentine, but it’s too much of a coincidence to discount.
Still, the whole business has been rather overshadowed by the celebrity disappearances.
There are more? Since Elton John?
Elton John disappeared?
Shut up, Eggsy.  75 54.
Two more, Stephen Hawking this weekend. And Lady G’Gar today.
Gaga. (off their looks) Sorry.

I think it’s time for Valentine and I te have a téte-a-téte. INT. LUXURY PRISON CELI, —- DAY. 75 The most luxurious prison cell we’ve ever seen. If it wer for the bars that divide it from the corridor outside, it would look like a suite in one of the world’s finest hote There doesn’t seem to be anyone in here. Valentine approaches carrying a silver DOMED SALVER.

Sir Elton? I have your dinner! Had it flown in directly from London. SPLAT. Something brown hits Valentine in the face. It loc worryingly like shit. And now Sir Elton John storms towards the bars, incandesc

And I have your fucking dinner! Flown in directly from my arsehole! Want some more?! He's holding A TURD in his hand. He flings it at Valentin This time, Valentine dodges it and backs away from the ba
It’s... From your favorite Indian restaurant.
You can stick it down the end of your fucking cock, you fucking psycho! Let me out! NOW!
I told you. You can go home any time. If you agree to the conditions.
Well I don’t fucking agree! I am never, EVER going to fucking agree!
76 INT. SICK BAY ~ NIGHT. 55. 76 Jack is asleep. It’s dark, beside the glow from the Ipad Eggsy's hand. He’s chanting softly under his breath.
Armenia: Yerevan. Australia: Canberra. Austria: Vienna. Jack blinks awake. He can hear Eggsy, and it’s annoying. EGGSY (CONT’D) Azerbaijan: Baku. Bahamas: Nassau.
What the hell are you doing?
Trying tc learn all the capitals. They always ask that shit in general knowledge tests.
Do it in your head. You know the trick? Make up something to link the words. Sillier the better. If it makes you laugh, you'll always remember it. Name a country.
Okay... Bahrain.

Capital city, Manama. I think of two sheep in a field, and it’s raining. One says: “baaa! Rain!” And the other starts doing a little dance to the Muppet song. (waving his arms stiffly) Manama-na. Doo-doo doo doo doo. Eggsy grins. Jack lies back down, pleased. Closes his eye Eggsy is silent for a while. Then loudly bursts out LAUGH JACK (CONT’D) Eggsy!
Sorry. I just thought of a really funny one for Armenia.

Okay, I tell you what -- if you get some sleep now, I’il lend you my lucky pen to do the test with. Jack scrabbles on the bedside table and grabs a MONT BLAN PEN. He tosses it onto Eggsy's bed.  77 78 79 80 56. Eggsy picks it up, looks at it suspiciously. It’s a nice
How lucky is it?
Very lucky. Go to sleep. Eggsy shrugs, puts the Ipad aside and lies down to sleep.

The candidates scribble away furiously at their exam pape Eggsy stares miserably at his. All the answers are blank. Eggsy's feet, his little dog looks up at him wistfully. Suddenly, the Mont Blanc pen begins to vibrate. Eggsy inspects it, curious. It looks normal. He draws a scribbl Suddenly it begins to vibrate again... And starts writing itself, quickly, dragging Eggsy’s hand along. It writes: “WINSTON CHURCHILL FAILED HIS A-LEVELS. DIDN'T

head_text.subj: STOP HIM FROM SAVING ENGLAND. EVERYBODY DESERVES A CHANCE

text: Stunned, Eggsy picks up the pen. He peers at the nib.

Jack is now dressed and sitting in the chair by the bed, ANOTHER PEN in his hand, a sheet of paper before him and phone propped up. On the phone’s screen we see: A slight fish-eye view of Eggsy‘s staring EYE. Then his F An amazed, grateful smile spreading across his lips. The image from the pen camera moves away from Eggsy’s fac land instead on: The first QUESTION on Eggsy’s exam paper Jack starts to write.
Eggsy scribbles away happily. Or rather, the pen does.
Six beds are empty now. Eggsy is back in his own bed. Rox reading. Charlie kicks the leg of Eggsy’s bed as he passe
You're a fucking cheat. When I find out how you did it, you’re screwed.  81 82 83 57.
Just because I didn’t go to private school doesn’t mean -—

Oh no, I’m sure you're highly educated. What have you got? A vocational diploma in carjacking? A B-Tec in impregnating ugly girls round the back of a bus sheiter? Eggsy sits up, hackles rising. Fist clenching. Roxy shoot him a look. He swallows his fury and looks away. Not toda EXT. VALENTINE’S HOUSE - NIGHT. 81 A palatial estate. Establishing. INT. VALENTINE’S HOUSE - ENTRANCE HALL - NIGHT. 82 Jack, in a green smoking jacket, follows A BUTLER. The Bu is wearing an EAR-PIECE like the one Professor Swanson wo As they near the dining room, TWO ATTRACTIVE YOUNG ASSIST pass. They wear EAR-PIECES. One holds a pile of PAPERWORK INT. VALENTINE’S DINING ROOM - NIGHT. 83 A magnificent dining room, the large table formally set f two. Valentine sits here, dressed extremely casually. The Butler opens the door and announces Jack.
Mr. Roman DeVere.
Hey, man. Sorry I didn’t feel the need to dress up.
Think nothing of it.
I don’t know how it is in England, but over here it's considered a little bit bourgeois.
I’ve always felt that over-dressed is preferable to under-dressed. When one is a guest, that is. Jack undoes his tie, sits. Valentine pours him wine.  58.
Thank you for your invitation. I must say I wasn’t expecting such a prompt reply to my request,
Well, I gotta admit: I was intrigued to meet you. There aren’t many billionaires I don't know.
I don’t doubt it.
So, I had my people look into your accounts. Obviously. That’s some pretty old money you’re from. How'd your family make it?
Property, mostly. Property and the markets. Nothing questionable, if that’s your concern.
Listen, you ask me, all money is dirty. I'm just into finding out what caliber of person you are. I’m sure you get that.
I most certainly do. The butler re-enters carrying MCDONALDS on a silver salve Jack doesn't flinch. JACK (CONT’D) The Big Mac, please.
Good call. But for me, you can’t beat two cheese burgers, with secret sauce. Goes great with a ‘55 Haut Brion. Jack takes a sip of his wine.
A classic pairing. And may I suggest twinkies and a 1937 Chateau Yquem for pudding?
Great idea. So, let’s talk. You wanna donate to my foundation... You are aware that I've wound things down in that area?  59.
Climate change is a threat that affects us all, Mr Valentine. And you're one of the few powerful men who seems to share my concerns.
A billion is a lot to offer any organization. Especially one that’s been inactive for two years.
About the right amount to get it kickstarted again? That's my hope.
I shut it down because I didn’t get anywhere. Every bit of research pointed to the same thing.
That carbon emissions are a red herring and we‘re past the point of no return no matter what remedial actions we take?
You know your shit.

There are times when I envy the blissful ignorance of those less well-versed in their shit. As Swanson always said: “humankind is the only virus cursed to live with the horrifying knowledge of its host's fragile mortality.”
Professor Swanson, man. I was bummed about that. Loved that guy.
Who didn’t.
Yeah. It’s funny, not a lot of people have heard of him. (then, pointed) You a fan of spy movies, Mr DeVere?
These days they’re all a little serious for my taste. But the old ones... Marvelous. Give me a far- fetched, theatrical plot any day.  60.
Right! The old Bond movies. Man. When I was a kid, that was, like, my dream job. Gentleman spy.
I always felt. the old Bond movies were only as good as the villain. As a child, I rather fancied a future as a colorful megalomaniac.

Well. Isn‘t it a pity we both had to grow up. (finishing his burger) Let's have dessert in the drawing room. 84 INT. VALENTINE’S HOUSE - ENTRANCE HALL - NIGHT. 84 Valentine is seeing Jack out at the front door.
Gimme a little time to think on your proposal, okay? My people will be in touch. Jack leaves and Valentine shuts the door. Then he pulls o his phone and makes a video-call to Gazelle.
Well?
Definitely.
Want me to follow him? I was gonna go get the next person on your list tomorrow, but I can reschedule.
No need. Nano-tracker gel in the Haut Brion. We'll know his every move. At least until he has a shit.
Eggsy, Roxy, Charlie, Henri, Omar and Kenji are here, wea HALO parachuting suits. Roxy has her eyes closed.
Fuckfuckfuckfuck.
What? Don’t like heights?  86 él.
Yeah. It’s okay, I’ve done it before. Which is probably why, come to think of it. Before Eggsy can respond, Merlin stands, addresses them a

Listen up! Your target is a red “H” -- that’s H for Huntsman. Your mission is to land in it without the radar detecting you. If I read you on radar or you do not land in the H, you will not be joining the H. Understood? Everybody murmurs their assent. Merlin grabs a loop and p on a HELMET. The candidates follow suit. The back of the plane opens.

Dropzone coming up. Twenty seconds. A BEEP begins, counting down. Everybody charges to the ha Merlin strolls past them, jumps out first. Then one by one, the rest pile out. Eggsy goes second to last, Roxy behind him. She clings to the door frame. Eggs pats her on the back before he jumps. Roxy closes her eyes arid, reluctantly, follows.

The six candidates plummet through the sky. Insanely high Merlin is already out of sight. Eggsy surveys his HEADS UP DISPLAY. He locates the H, and begins to enjoy the flying sequence, everyone jockeying f first position, trash-talking through the comms.
Cheer up, Eggsy! I’ll get the kettle on when I land, have a nice cup of tea waiting for you.
I don't know, Charlie. It might get cold.
Didn’t know Charlie knew how to work a kettle.  62.

Don't worry, I'll be down there first to show him. Suddenly, Merlin’s voice cuts in, MERLIN (¥.0.) My my, you're all very cheerful. Did you really think this was going to be straightforward? (a nerve jangling beat) Any idiot can use a heads-up display. A Huntsman agent needs to be able to solve problems under pressure. Like what to do when one of your group has no parachute.
Which one?!
Who?
What do we do?
I told you: aim for the H, come in under the radar. And I hope not to be scraping one of you up. But if I do, and it’s from inside the H, please know I'll be very impressed.
Everybody listen! I’ve got a plan —- pair off! Grab the closest person. Nobody argues. Henri grabs Charlie. Roxy grabs Omar. Eggs reaches out for Kenji.

Kenji? Kenji is panicking. The ground now seems far closer now. Gripped by fear, Kenji pulls his rip-cord. Nothing happen He and Eggsy lock eyes. Kenji tries again. Kenji’s PARACHUTE opens, and he disappears from view.
Shit! We're an odd number now, Kenji, you wanker!... Quick, make a circle! Roxy grabs Eggsy’s hancl. With his free one, he grabs Cha
Fuck off, Eggsy! We'll all die!  63.
We pull our cords one by one. Soon as we know who's fucked, person on their right grabs them.
Good plan, Eggsy. You have thirty seconds. Hurry.
Me first. Charlie doesn’t wait for a response. He pulls his cord. H chute opens and he shoots upwards. Henri goes next. His chute opens too.
Omar’s chute also opens: Just Eggsy and Roxy left now. Roxy is petrified.

Hold me tight. It’ll be okay. Promise. Yours first, okay? Roxy nods. They hold each other. Eggsy pulls Roxy’s cord. Roxy’s chute opens and they both fly up. Eggsy struggles to hold on to her. He ends up clinging to leg. Roxy is screaming. They hit the ground hard. We pull back to see: they are the only ones in the H. Mer is standing nearby. He walks over.
Congratulations. You two managed to set a record. Opening at three hundred feet was pretty ballsy. Omar lands in the H. Followed by Henri and Charlie.

I should fail the rest of you. You opened too early, people. You were all over that radar. But given the circumstances I’ll let you all off. {Kenji lands behind him) Except Kenji. Pack your bags. Kenji walks away from the group, ashamed.
Sorry sir, but why the fuck did you choose me as the gimp? Am I the expendable candidate?  87 64.

Don’t bellow, Eggsy. If you have a complaint, whisper it in my ear. Come on. Don"t be shy. Eggsy approaches him, nervous now. He gets close. He’s ab to whisper to Merlin... when Merlin whispers to him inste MERLIN (CONT‘D) You really need to take that chip off your shoulder. He pulls Eggsy’s cord. The chute opens, sending him flyin

The middle of nowhere. A MOTORBIKE tears across the sand, rider cutting loose, doing tricks, just for the hell of i Suddenly a HELICOPTER appears. The Biker changes directio The helicopter banks, follows him. Is this a chase now? Finally, the helicopter lands.
The rider stops, takes off his helmet. He is DAVID BECKHA From nowhere, a BLACK 4X4 drives towards him, fast. Gazelle gets out of the helicopter. Beckham calls out to
Oh come on, this is one of my few escapes. Just take your picture and then get lost, alright?
I‘m not paparazzi, Mr Beckham, I’m here to collect you.
What? Who are you? Two SECURITY GUARDS burst from the 4X4 and charge at Gaze

You! Step away from Mr. Beckham! To everyone’s surprise, Gazelle begins to run towards the He bounds into the air, and with a flying kick... Siashes the throat of one of the Security Guards. The Gua crumples to his knees, clutching his neck, then collapses The Second Security guard reaches for his weapon but... a roundhouse move from Gazelle leaves him cleanly beheaded. Beckham is terrified. He holds his hands up in surrender.  65.

My boss will explain everything. And there’s a lovely bottle of Chateau Petrus on board, your favorite. I mean you no harm. Please know that as long as you get in the helicopter, I'm under very strict instruction not to hurt you.
Really? Gazelle nods reassuringly, and Beckham walks towards him. Reaching Gazelle's side, Beckham kicks him in the balls.
So I can do that? (Gazelle nods, in pain) And I could do it again? And you’re not allowed to retaliate? (heading for the chopper) How long’s the journey?
We hear a toilet FLUSH. And Jack exits the cubicle. Arthu here, washing his hands. Jack joins him.
Valentine was on to me, Arthur. I think it’s time to get MI5 onboard.

We can’t make the same mistake we did with Bin Laden pre 9-11. Look how long it took the agencies to act on our information, and he was a known terrorist, for gods sake. We need something conerete first.

He didn’t let me out of his sight. All I got was this. On the way in. Jack takes his phone from his pocket, shows it to Arthur: A PHOTO of Valentine's Assistants. Jack zooms in on the paperwork one of them is holding. Top of the pile: AN INVITATION TO ROYAL ASCOT.
Excellent. Only a few days until he’s on our home turf, then. We can keep tabs on him, gather some more intel. Oh, and in case you hadn’t heard, some football type has gone missing now.  66.
Eggsy, Roxy and Charlie sleep. All other beds are empty n
Valentine talks to a large gathering of INTERNATIONAL PRE

In the past, I’ve gone on record saying that I want to make a difference. It’s a phrase you hear a lot. And what tends to follow it are actions that have very little net effect on our daily lives. (a beat) Well... I’m here to put my money where my mouth is. And right into the pockets of the man and woman on the street. Every year, each of us spends on average nearly two thousand dollars on cell phone and internet usage. It is my privilege to announce: those days are over. A curtain behind Valentine swishes open to reveal: a huge SCREEN. On it, an image of A SATELLITE in SPACE. VALENTINE (CONT’D) From tomorrow, every man, woman and child who so desires can claim a free sim card and usb stick, compatible with any phone, any computer, in order to utilise my communications network. For free. (There is wild APPLAUSE) And now I'd like to introduce you to the spokesman for this venture -— aman who we were all very happy to learn was simply a victim of bad reporting: David Beckham! David Beckham walks out to WILD CHEERING.
Jack is at his computer, watching the news report.

Not half as happy as I am! (pausing for LAUGHTER) But today isn’t about me. It’s about the incredible generosity of this man right here. You heard him! Free calls. Free internet. For everyone. Forever.
92 67. The crowd GO CRAZY. Jack pauses on a C/U of Beckham. He‘’ wearing an EARPIECE. Jack puts on his glasses, calls Arth
Arthur. Seen Beckham? Back, saying he was never gone, Wearing an earpiece. Swanson all over again.
Let’s try to avoid having his head explode this time, shall we?
I doubt I‘1l get to him. He has a twenty four hour security detail. I’m more concerned about Valentine putting his technology in millions of people’s homes, their pockets. We've seen what it can do.
That technology requires an earpiece. We’ve no reason to suspect this scheme is connected.
Regardless... I don't like it. Let's get hold of one of these things and have Merlin analyze it.
A small council estate shop. A rowdy CROWD outside jostle get in. Eggsy’s friends Jamal and Ryan are among the thro At the door, Eqgsy’s mum Michelle, phone in hand, struggl
Oi, Mrs P! You get one?
Yeah. Been queuing all day.
(pointing to his eye) You get that in there?!
No. You heard from Eqgsy?
Nah. But don’t worry love, he’ll turn up soon. He always does.  68.
Eggsy, Roxy and Charlie are watching TV NEWS. Merlin ente
«Similar scenes played out worldwide, as shops ran out of the sim cards and usb sticks within hours of receiving new deliveries.
Thought we were done for the day, did you? We‘’re not. Go and put on your best clothes.
I’ve only got what I came in.
I‘ll authorize the bursar to give you some funds. You can buy yourself something on the way.
On the way to where?

London. Lulu’s nightclub, to be precise. You're going to use your NLP training to win over a selected target whose photo is now on your bed. And when I say “win over”, I mean it in the biblical sense. 94 INT. DORM ~ NIGHT. o4 Eggsy, Roxy and Charlie run to their beds and grab the PHOTOGRAPHS waiting there. Eggsy shows Roxy his: a VERY PRETTY POSH GIRL. Text reads: “LADY SOPHIE MONTAGUE-HERRI
Easy. Posh girls love a bit of rough.
We'll see about that, won’t we, Charlie shows Eggsy hig photo: It’s the same girl.

We certainly will. Roxy holds up her photo. It’s Lady Sophie again. We move into the photo and match cut to...  95 96 69. INT. LULU‘S - NIGHT. 95 Lady Sophie, in the flesh. Dancing in a classy nightclub, full of well-dressed YCUNG PEOPLE. We pull back, out of the front window of the club, to...

The queue outside. More well-dressed YOUNG PEOPLE wait to in. Even the BOUNCERS look elegant. Charlie and Roxy are the back of the line, both impeccably dressed. Presently, Eggsy arrives. He stares at the queue in disma He's wearing DESIGNER SPORTSWEAR. Charlie laughs loudly.
Ignore him, Eggsy.
Yeah, ignore me, you look great. If you're going to a gypsy wedding.
Fuck off, these crepes cost three hundred quid! Nike Le Bron X! And I dunno why you're so smug. You look like you're trying to pull the Queen Mother,

The Queen’s third cousin, actually. He’s at the front of the queue now. He hands the bouncer INVITATION and moves past with a smirk. Roxy shows hers, the bouncer ushers her in. At Eggsy’s, however, he hesita
I'm afraid I can't let you in, sir. We have a strict dress code.
We're together. The bouncer shrugs apologetically.
Just go in, Roxy. Thanks anyway.

Aw, you ruined my plan! I was going to let you talk to Lady Sophie first and then swoop in to rescue her once she was sufficiently disgusted. And with that, Charlie swans inside. And Eggsy walks away  97 98 70.

A SIGN outside the back-door reads: “LULU’S - NO ENTRANCE DELIVERIES DURING OFFICE HOURS ONLY.” Eggsy is here, tryi to pick the lock. Not having much luck. Suddenly the door swings open violently, hitting him. A pretty waitress, 20s, holding an unlit cigarette and a lighter, stares at him in surprise. This is POPPY. When s speaks, it’s with an accent similar to Eggsy's.
Shit, sorry! You alright?
Yeah. Don’t suppose you wanna turn a blind eye if I come in this way?

(lighting her cigarette) They’1l only chuck you out, dressed like that. Anyway, place is full of arseholes. Unless you were planning to rob it, I wouldn’t bother. Eggsy can’t help but smile. She's cute.
Ain’t totally full of arseholes. You're in there. She smiles back and takes off her apron.

Not for long. Early shift today. Knocking off soon, if you wanna take me for a drink. (off his hesitation) Listen, when I said about what you was wearing... I meant from their point of view. Personally, I think you look fit as.

You ain't bad yourself. Look, my mates are in there. How about you let me in now, and tomorrow I'11 take you wherever you want? She thinks on this a moment. Then she smiles at Eggsy, an holds open the door for him. INT. LULU‘S SERVICE CORRIDOR. 98 Eggsy heads down the corridor past CRATES OF CHAMPAGNE. H passes a store room. Over the pounding of MUSIC from the beyond, we can hear MOANS coming from inside. Eggsy peeks  99 100 71. Behind a stack of wine crates, there‘s an intense threeso going on: Lady Sophie, Roxy and Charlie. Eggsy has lost. He's out. He storms towards the exit, stealing a bottle of Champagne as he passes. At the door, Poppy is putting out her cigarette.

Know what? Fuck it, babe. Let's have that drink. INT. POPPY’S DODGY FLAT! - NIGHT. 99 Eggsy and Poppy fall in through the door, drunk. She pushes him to the couch, pulls off her top, puts her down his pants as they kiss. He’s lost in the moment unti
You work for Huntsman, don’t you?
For who?
It’s alright babe, you can tell me, I won‘t tell no one. They always send people to Lulu’s.
Dunno what you’re on about. She pulls away, looks apologetic. Then speaks in Russian.
I'm sorry. Suddenly, THREE BIG RUSSIAN GUYS burst in from another ro and swarm Eggsy. One throws a hood over Eggsy’s head.
Eggsy is tied to a railway track. The Three Russian Guys Poppy stand over him. Poppy now speaks in a Russian accen
We've been monitoring the Huntsman shop, Eggsy. We saw you there. This doesn’t have to be so hard.
I told you, I work for the post office! I drop stuff off all over London. Whoever you think I am, you've got the wrong bloke.  72.
You went in to Huntsman one night, and didn’t come out again. There’s a distant HONK. A train coming. Eggsy starts to c
Is Huntsman worth dying for?
Just let me go! Please!
You don’t have to die. Do you work for Huntsman | ? The TRAIN is in view now. Eggsy just SOBS.

Last chance! Poppy and the Guys back away. The train looms. Eggsy SCRE Just as the train is about to hit him, the section of tra that Eggsy is tied to DROPS abruptly. Eggsy is now three feet below the track, concrete walls o either side of him. The train THUNDERS overhead. Just the clear night sky above Eggsy now. Silence. And th GRINDING NOISE as his section of track RISES back into pl Poppy and the Men are gone. Standing in their place is: J He smiles and starts to cut Eggsy free.
Congratulations! Bloody well done! And the tears -- incredible acting!
I wasn't fucking acting! He gets up, furious. Jack looks taken aback.
Are you alright?
What? No! Of course I’m not! What’s wrong with you?! Jack pulls out his phone and presses PLAY on a video. ON SCREEN: footage of Charlie, Sophie and Roxy.
Maybe this'll cheer up you a bit?  101 102 73.

I'm not really in the mood, thanks. Jake pushes the phone at Eggsy, making him look. INT. LULU‘S STORE ROOM - NIGHT. 101 Lady Sophie whispers something to Charlie. He whispers ba Then Lady Sophie stands up and rearranges her dress as th two Bouncers burst in and throw a SACK over Roxy’s head. They drag her out. Sophie follows, leaving Charlie alone. Moments later, Arthur enters, looking furious. Charlie miserably does up his trousers, humiliated.
Eggsy looks away from the phone, not cheered up at all.
Charlie didn’t even make it to the real test. Gave his identity away mid-fellatio.
No one expected me to pull Lady Sophie, did they? They didn’t even expect me to get in.
It didn't matter who any of you ended up with. The test always ends the same way.
Oh yeah? And the back up is always a chavvy waitress is it? Or was she just for me? Admit it, Jack -- I'm not like you. I’m not like any of you. Just give the job to Roxy. I don't belong at Huntsman.
The results of your tests suggest otherwise. Come on, Let’s go.
Were you listening? I don’t wanna go back.

Then come with me, instead. I want to show you something.  103 74. INT. JACK’S MEWS HOUSE - NIGHT, 103 Eggsy is looking at all the stupid headlines on Jack’s wa Jack points to the recently added one about Kim Kardashia
That was the headline the day after I diffused a dirty bomb in Paris. He points to another: “BRANGELINA TO BUY 22M LONDON PAD?”
Broke up an undercover spy ring at the Pentagon, He points to an old, yellowed one: A picture of BOY GEORG beside the headline “SEX? I’D PREFER A NICE CUP OF TEA!”
Foiled the assassination of Margaret Thatcher. My first mission.
Not everybody would thank you for that one.
The point is, Eggsy, nobody thanked me for any of them. The front page news on all these occasions was celebrity nonsense, because the nature of Huntsman is that our achievements remain secret.
And this is supposed to make me want to stay? Now Jack fixes two glasses of whiskey as he talks.

People like Charlie are all ego. They're after glory. And that’s not Huntsman. The best we can offer is the warm glow of a job well done. A job that matters a great deal... You're not lazy, Eggsy. If you wanted an ordinary life and an ordinary job, you’d have got one, despite your protestations. I saw it in you as soon as I met you. You were looking for something more. Jack hands Eggsy a whiskey and he downs it in one.  75. JACK (CONT’D) No, no. One may down brandy, but whiskey is sipped. This is a 1943 Dalmore, the finest single malt. It should be drunk with a splash of room-temperature water, never with ice, and it should be savored. Let it comfort you with a slow hug, not a quick fuck,
See?! I don’t know this stuff! I don't know shit! Maybe be I am looking for something more out of life -- doesn’t change the basic fact that I don’t fit in!
Oh for god’s sake. All that can be learnt. It’s what you have naturally that can't.
You lot had a lifetime to learn it.

Stop whining, will you? Plenty of us didn’t. Arthur didn’t. Like most snobs, he came from perfectly humble roots. He started out at Huntsman as a bloody pattern cutter! Tell you what, get some sleep -- guest room’s on the left -- and tomorrow, you'll give me a day of your time. Then decide. Deal?
Jack holds out his hand. Eggsy hesitates. Then shakes it. 104 EXT. ST. JAMES’ AVENUE - DAY. 104 A wide shot. Jack and Eggsy walk down the street.
So, are you going to teach me how to talk “proper” as well? Like in My Fair Lady?
Don’t be absurd. Being a gentleman has nothing to do with one’s accent. It‘s about being at ease in one’s own s +» Now, your suit will be ready by lunch. But the accessories are just as important.
An incredibly classy men’s shoe shop. The STAFF greet Jac warmly as he and Eggsy enter. Jack picks out a pair of Oxfords.
Oxfords not brogues.
Very good. In the FITTING ROOM, Eggsy tries them on. They look weird with the track suit bottoms he’s wearing.

Huntsman has long enjoyed a relationship with certain other places serving gentlemen’s needs. These are no ordinary Oxfords. Do your best impression of a German aristocrat's formal greeting. Eggsy looks uncertain, then does a Nazi salute. Jack rolls his eyes, stands up and clicks his heels toget A BLADE snaps out of the toe of his shoe, JACK (CONT’D) In the old days they had a phone in the heel, as well. Blade's coated with Polonium, so be careful. Eggsy clicks his heels. His own blade pops out.
How do I get it back in?
Very carefully. Jack stamps his heel. The blade retracts.
A 250 year old leather-goods emporium. Jack and Eggsy ent
Jack shows Eggsy a very cool-looking BRIEFCASE.
They used one like this in From Russia with Love. But this model has many more features.  108 109 77. Eggsy is distracted by a beautiful WHEELED BAG nearby.
Do I need a briefcase? Could I use one of these instead?
My boy, if you become a Huntsman you can have the pick of anything you like, and Merlin will conform it to Huntsman specifications. They look at the UMBRELLAS and WALKING STICKS.
I always wanted a sword stick.

Oh, we have those. But why bring a knife to a gunfight? (he cocks an umbrella) More lethal than an M16 assault rifle, but in the right hands, the perfect way to stay dry. If only the Americans could comprehend that.
The venerable shirt-makers.
Eggsy is trying on a SHIRT in the fitting room.

A gentleman always wears a double cuff. And these are made with reinforced cotton to handle the Huntsman cuff-link. May feel a little stiff at first -- there’s kevlar woven into the thread. But you'll be glad of it if you should ever need it. You like this one? Eggsy admires himself in the mirror and nods. Then, pensi
I feel bad. You buying me all this stuff. I/1]1 pay you back.
Oh nonsense. It’s not as if I have anyone else to spend money on. And as they say, you can’t take it with you when you go.  78.
A beautiful wine shop. Eggsy looks around, confused.
Exploding liquid in the bottle?
Don’t be silly. Thats made by Floris, next door. And it smells good enough to be aftershave. Jack leads him to a flight of back stairs leading downsta
There’s a dining table down here, elaborately set. They s

Here’s the one place we can go for a good meal and a fabulous drink without having to watch our tongues. Now, there’s no point locking like a gentleman if you can’t eat like one. But it’s not hard. Once everyone is seated, you unfold your napkin and place it on your lap. Jack demonstrates. Eggsy follows suit.
If you leave the table during the meal, you lay the napkin casually on the table. Don’t re-fold it. Eggsy nods, listening intently. A WAITER appears at his shoulder with a silver tray of BREAD ROLLS.
One serves oneself when offered a dish in this way. But if the dish is placed on the table, you offer it to your immediate neighbors before taking your own portion. Eggsy nods and takes a bread roll.

Always break bread with your hands, never cut. And this is a butter knife. The only one to remember. (holding his up) The rest of the cutlery is easy: start on the outside, work your way in with each course. And never let anyone describe you as “H.K.L.P”.  79.
What's that?
"Holds knife like pen”. A habit erroneously believed to be upper class dining etiquette. It is quite the opposite. The waiter returns with a SOUP TUREEN. Eggsy serves himse
Excellent.
Do I wait ‘til everyone's been served to start eating?
Only if the dish being served is cold, or if the Queen is present. Otherwise, tuck in. Eggsy starts eating his soup, scooping it towards himself
Other way. Always push the spoon away from you. Eggsy jokily picks up the bowl and brings it to his mouth
This is okay though, right?
Actually if you're in Japan, it's absolutely the done thing.
Jack pauses dramatically outside the shop.
Now for the piece de resistance!
Jack leads Eggsy to the fitting room. One of the TAILORS stops them. He addresses Jack.
I‘m so sorry, sir, but a gentleman is completing his fitting. Fitting room two is available, if you like?  114 115 80.

One does not use room two when popping ones cherry. We'll wait. The fitting room door opens and Valentine steps out in Huntsman'’s finest morning suit. Jack stays cool. JACK (CONT‘D) It’s not often that I’m the one who looks under-dressed,.

Mr. DeVere! What a coincidence! You are totally why I’m here! There I was, admiring your smoking jacket, and I suddenly realized it was the same cut as my father’s. He always had his suits made here. And apparently you gotta have one of these crazy penguin costumes for Ascot. So here I am! What are you doing here? (he looks at Eggsy) This your son?
My new valet. I’m just introducing him to my tailor.
Another coincidence! Me too. He indicates Gazelle, now emerging from the changing room Jack maintains his composed smile and slips on his glasse
on the screen: footage of Valentine on the shop floor, as recorded live now by Jack. Arthur puts on his own glasses

I know, I know. Don’t spook him. I spoke with him, and you’re right -- he’s onto us. We can’t go to Ascot, but MI5 can. I’m contacting them now. You win, Galahad. INT. HUNTSMAN SHOP —- DAY. 115 dack continues his polite talk with Valentine.
Have you had a chance to think any further on my proposal?  116 117 81.

You'll be hearing from us ver soon. I guarantee it. He takes off the morning jacket -- chalked for alteration hands it to the tailor and heads for the door. As Valentine leaves, he is discretely followed by UNDERCO SECURITY MEN we had previously taken to be casual custome As soon as they’ve all left, the tailor ushers Eggsy into dressing room, and Jack urgently resumes his conversation
And if MI5 don’t bite? Jack listens to the reply, sighs. He removes his glasses.
Jack enters to see Eggsy admiring the beautiful SUIT that hanging here, feeling the fabric. In awe.
So. Are you back in? (off Eggsy’s eager nod) Excellent. Jack gets out his lighter and shoots Eggsy with a dart. A we fade to black.
An ECU of a HANDWRITTEN NOTE. It reads: “YOUR PASSPORT IS

head_text.subj: UNDER THE MATTRESS IN THE MASTER BEDROOM AT 188 CAHILLA
STREET. IF YOU'RE NOT BACK AT BASE IN 24 HOURS, YOU ARE O

text: We pull back to see that the note has been stuck to Eqgsy forehead. He's still out cold. Pulling further back, we s that he is naked... And lying in the road. We can hear a HONKING. It wakes Eggsy up. The honking is coming from A POLICE CAR. Eggsy gets unsteadily to his feet, utterly confused... He rips the n from his forehead and reads it as he approaches the cop c A COP leaps out, gun om Eggsy. Eggsy puts his hands up.
(in Spanish, subtitled) Cover your balls!
I don’t speak your language.  118 119 122 82.
(in English) Cover you balls you English pig. Eggsy does as he’s told. The Cop pulls out HANDCUFFS, but before he can use them, Eggsy punches him out cold. Eggsy leans down to study the Cop’s BADGE.
Colombia! ?
Another HANDWRITTEN NOTE.It says: “YOUR PASSPORT IS ON DE

head_text.subj: FOUR. IF YOU'RE NOT BACK AT BASE IN 24 HOURS, YOU ARE OUT

text: We pull back to see that it is taped to the chest of a na sleeping Roxy. She wakes up, reads the note, INT. CORRIDOR - DAY. Roxy exits the storage room and stumbles into a corridor. Seeing a BIN, she pulls out the BIN-LINER and makes a pon
Close on the INSIGNIA on the cop car door. We jib up to reveal: Eggsy, in the driver’s seat, now wearing the Cop‘ uniform. He punches the address into the SAT NAV.
Piece of piss. He turns on the radio and the sirens and speeds away.
Roxy explores another corridor. A SIGN with an arrow poin to “DECK FOUR”. She follows it.
Roxy steps outside. At her feet she sees: her PASSPORT. T she looks up and her face falls. We pull back to reveal: She is on an isolated OIL RIG.

The cop car pulls up. Inside, Eggsy uses the Cop’s phone to get online. ON THE SCREEN: we see the home-page for “GOOGLE TRANSLATE.”  123 83. Moments later, Eggsy is knocking on the huge front door. opens to reveal an incredulous INTIMIDATING MAN. Eggsy sp to him in European Spanish, subtitled.
I have a need to check your house. The man laughs. Eggsy pulls out the phone, tries again. EGGSY (CONT’D) I must search inside your house.
(In Spanish, subtitled) Is this a joke?
Hold on, repeto?
(in English) Respect??
Aaaah, no, I... Repeto? “Repeat?” I didn’t understand. Look, may I --
Maybe you will understand this. The Man slams the door shut... And then all hell breaks loose. MACHINE GUNS open fire. Eggsy scrambles into the c and reverses as it is riddled by a hail of bullets.
A safe distance from the mansion, Eggsy gets out of the c A MUFFLED SCREAM is coming from the trunk. Eggsy opens it reveal the Cop, in his underwear, handcuffed.
What the fuck is going on? He sits up. Seeing the mansion up the street, he laughs.
Crazy gringo. You try to go there?
They have my passport. cop This is house of Carlos Peres. Cartel leader. Maybe biggest in Colombia. You work for him? Eggsy un-cuffs the Cop, who climbs out.  127 84.

No! I’m on your side. I'll let you go. But I need your gun. coP You try to kill them? You crazy. The cop leans into the car. He opens the seat to reveal: A hidden cache of GUNS. COP (CONT‘D) But doing something I would love to do. Take your pick.
Roxy tries the radio. It's dead. She tries a few other buttons. All dead. There’s no power.

Roxy opens the fridge, the cupboards. They’re empty. On the counter are a few LADS’ MAGAZINES. Roxy reads the on the cover of one. It says: OCTOBER 1992. She looks at the others, with an expression that betrays heart sinking feeling: this rig has been decommissioned. She rummages under the sink and finds: a pad of STESL WOO for scrubbing pans. She looks pleased, leaves purposefull taking the wire wool and magazines with her.

Roxy enters. The beds are bare. She begins to search the room. There are no clothes in the closets or drawers. But in one drawer, she finds: a TV REMOTE. She kisses Then she rips open the back panel, tips out the BATTERY.
Over the pile of magazines, Roxy fiddles with the wire wo and the battery, concentrating hard. Suddenly: SPARKS! In moments, one of the magazines is ON FIRE. She picks it
Beautifully dressed aristocrats enjoy mingling, champagne horse racing. In that order. Some wear EARPIECES.  129 85.

Noah had a chance to make the world a better place but he blew it. I mean, mosquitos? Ticks? Really? Now we see that he is flirting with a BEAUTIFUL WOMAN. Sh laughs appreciatively, then gives him a teasing smile.
I‘ve not seen you watch a single race yet. I’m not sure why you bothered coming here today.
People to see, you know. But it’s always nice to mix business with pleasure.
I have an instinct that’s something you're extremely good at.
I think my reputation precedes me.

It does indeed... I hope you’ll forgive me, there’s something I really must do. Valentine looks perplexed. Did he misread her signals? Th suddenly the woman leans in, kisses him passionately... Until they’re interrupted by a SUITED OFFICIAL.

Mr Valentine, sir. Their Royal Highnesses will speak with you now. He throws the woman an apologetic “whatcha gonna do?” loo INT. JACK’S CAR - DAY. 129 The woman gets into the driver’s seat of Jack’s car, wipi her mouth. She claws at. her face, tears off her LATEX MA It's Jack! He puts on his glasses.
Nice work. Last agent who used one of those swallowed the damn thing before he could plant it. The tracker’s working.
(in the woman’s voice) At least until he takes a shit. (MORE)
{He fiddles with his NECKLACE; his voice returns to normal) Sorry.
We've started coating the trackers with a constipating formula. Buys us at least thirty six hours.
Any news on Eggsy?
Nothing on either of them yet. What happened to MI5? No sign of anyone?

Arthur was right first time —- dragging their heels, as usual. The head of it was there looking as if he didn’t have a care in the world besides whether his horse won. You monitor Valentine, I'll go home and slip into something more
comfortable.

The window in here is covered with A THIN WIRE MESH SCREE Outside, we see the silhouette of a SILENCER PISTOL. Then -- PFFT -- a bullet comes through the screen, Eggsy’s hand, wrapped in his police shirt, snakes through hole, expanding it, until he can reach through to the CAT Eggsy pushes the screen. It lifts. He climbs into the roo

Eggsy creeps along the landing, peering into the bedrooms A HUGE CARTEL GUARD is coming up the stairs. Eggsy times his run perfectly, meeting the Guard with a jujitsu neck-hold that prevents him from making any noise The Guard struggles, trying to shake Eggsy off, but Eggsy hangs on until the guard drops to the floor, unconscious.

The oil rig is now a BLAZING INFERNO. We pull back further to reveal Roxy in a SMALL INFLATABLE LIFEBOAT. She's waving her arms, passport in hand.  133 134 135 87. Pulling back further still, we see a HELICOPTER approachi

A GORGEOUS WOMAN is asleep here. Eggsy creeps towards her Holding his breath, he slips his hand under the mattress. It's unbearably tense. The woman stirs... And wakes up! Face to face with Eggsy. Panicking, he grab the mattress and yanks it up, tipping her to the ground.

Sorry! The bed base is exposed. There is nothing there. The woman SCREAMS, trapped under the mattress. We can hea the thundering of many, many heavy FOOTFALLS, men running And now Eggsy can see them: FOUR GUARDS, running, guns dr and a well-dressed older man, CARLOS PERES. The woman finally wriggles from beneath the mattress. See the men coming, she dives back under it, taking cover. Eggsy draws his gun, but he is well and truly fucked.
Jack wears his glasses, on a call.
Think he's headed for the airport?
Merlin and Arthur wait outside, both on the call to Jack.
It's possible. Arthur's updated MI5. Should be the boot up the arse they need. I’1l keep you posted.
Don’t take your eyes off hin, please. Not until he’s in custody.
Agreed. (removing his glasses) A-ha. Here she is. Roxy walks triumphantly towards them.  88.
And two minutes to spare! Very well done, Roxy.

Indeed. Heartiest congratulations, and welcome to Huntsman. Our tailors aren't accustomed to making ladies’ suits, but I’m sure they’ll rise to occasion. Arthur holds out his hand. Roxy shakes it uncertainly.
Eggsy hasn't made it back? {off his head shake) But he’s okay?
We've not had any word. What’s the matter? You should be celebrating. A JET appears on the horizon. Merlin’s watch flashes. He his glasses to take a call.

Yes, Control? Yes, I see it. (To Arthur} We have an unidentified plane approaching, looks like it’s intending to land. Get clear. The three of them begin to run as the Jet bears down on t A BLACK GULF STREAM, unbelievably loud. Running in the ot direction, ARMED HUNTSMEN SECURITY rush out towards it. The jet lands and comes to a stop right next to them.
The jet DOOR opens. Security train their rifles. Suddenly, a bound, gagged Carlos Peres is hurled from the jet. Seconds later, Eggsy emerges.

Hope you don"t mind I brought Carlos. Just thought if he was gonna do time, he should do it here. Learn something about the effect his trade has on the end user. Am I late? Everyone gapes at him. Roxy runs forward, jumping over Ca Peres to hug Eggsy. He looks at Arthur and Merlin.
I hope nicking a plane's not against the rules. It’s just that you forgot to hide my passport.
(knowing full well) Did we?
You're within the time, Eggsy.
So. The tests continue.
Tonight?
Let them shower and change first. 136 INT. ARTHUR'S SECRET BASE OFFICE — DAY. gg. 136 Eggsy enters. Arthur is playing with Eggsy’s dog.
He’s very sweet. What's his name?
As in James Bond?
No, as in Jason Bourne,

Jolly good. It pains me to admit it, Eggsy, but you’ve done better than I could ever have imagined. He draws a GUN and points it at Eggsy, who doesn’t flinch ARTHUR (CONT’D) Take it. (Eggsy does) Now shoot JB. Eggsy tries to hide his horror. He raises the gun and aim at his dog. The dog walks up to the barrel and licks it. Eggsy lowers the gun in despair. No way he can do this. From another room, we hear: A GUNSHOT. ARTHUR (CONT’D) At least the girl has some balls. Eggsy grabs the dog and runs from the room. watches him go. Then he picks up the phone. Arthur just  137 138 139 140 90. ARTHUR (CONT’D) Merlin, bring Roxy in, please. And contact the agents. We’ll hold her swearing-in ceremony in an hour.
Eggsy gets into a Bristol car and begins to hot-wire it. little dog watches from the passenger seat.
The Bristol speeds out of the hangar and races away. INT. EGGSY’S MUM'S FLAT - DAY 139 The doorbell RINGS. Michelle answers it, to see: Eggsy. H dog at his side. Michelle throws her arms around him.
Oh my god, where have you been? I‘ve been so worried! Now he sees her black eye. Anger rising.
Where is he?
I’m fine, Eggsy. Don’t get involved. Let me make you a tea.
No, I should never have left you alone. This stops right now. Look after the dog. I’ll be right back.
Dean and his Gang Boys are sitting outside, drinking. The Bristol pulls up. To their disbelief, Eggsy opens the win
Oi. Dean. Can I have a word?
Only if you get out that poncy car first. And only if the word is “ow, you broke my nose.”  142 143 91.

That‘s five words. But no worries. About time you hit a man instead of a bird. Tell your muppets to go inside, and 1’11 get out the car. Dean nods and the Boys all run inside. Seconds later, the appear at the pub window, craning for a good view.

Come on then, you little prick. Eggsy smiles calmly and reaches for the door handle. THUN The lock clicks shut. Eggsy tries to pull it. It won’t bu Dean looks at him, incredulous. Eggsy reacts in total dismay and puzzlement as -- ROAR! ~ the engine starts. And the car pulls away! The Gang Boys LAUGH loudly. Dean yells after him.
Chicken shit! Come back when you've grown a pair!

Eggsy is seething. Nothing he does has any effect. Pedals steering wheel, gear stick -- they’re all locked in place And still the car keeps driving. EXT. JACK’S HOUSE - DAY 142 The Bristol comes hurtling down Jack's mews. Jack is stan at his front door, holding a REMOTE CONTROL. The car stops sharply beside him.
If there were such thing as an ejector seat, I'd be using it right now. Get out. INT. JACK’S HOUSE ~ DAY. 143 Jack shuts the door and rounds on Eggsy.
You threw away your greatest achievement over a fucking dog. And then you stole one of our cars. Thanks for humiliating me.  92.

If you think it’s alright to shoot a dog just to get a fucking job, then I’m happy I humiliated you. I’m only sorry I didn't do worse. Jack grabs Eggsy by his collar and marches him to the loo kicks the door open to reveal: A MOUNTED TAXIDERMY DOG.
You're right! And the guilt never left me, but I understood the importance of following orders, and Mr Pickle here reminds me of that every time I take a shit.
You shot your dog and had it stuffed, you sick fuck!?

No. I shot my dog. And then I brought him home and continued to care for him for the next eleven years until he died of pancreatitis. It was a blank, Eggsy. It was a fucking blank. (off Eggsy’s silence) And do you remember Amelia? (off his nod) She works at our tech department in Berlin. She’s fine. Limits must be tested, but Huntsman only condones risking a life to save another.
Oh yeah? Like my dad saved yours? Even though your fuck up cost his? This hits Jack hard. His emotional dam finally breaks.

And as long as I live, I’ll never forget it. Never forgive myself. Can't you see that? That all I’ve ever wanted is to make it right somehow? Can't you see that everything I’ve done is about trying to repay him? By giving his son a new life. The life he so dearly wanted for himself.
(moved, softening) I‘m sorry. You gave me a chance. I'll always be grateful for that. (MORE)

I’m gonna take what you taught me and try and do something good with my life. For my dad. And for you. (a beat) Shall I take the car back now? They are interrupted by a SIGNAL from Jack's watch. He pu on his glasses, throws Eggsy an apologetic look.

(on the phone) ++-You're joking! Where the hell were MI5?!... Any idea of the destination . Well there are dozens of airports in Kansas, do we know which one?... I’m on my way. (glasses off, to Eggsy) I'm sorry, I need to go. Look, I'll be back in a couple of days. Stay here ‘til then. I’1l call Merlin, and when everything's calmed down, I'll take you in and finesse things. If we’re lucky, we may be able to secure you a job in admin, or train you up as a pilot.
Thank you. Honestly. I’11 do anything. I’ll be a cleaner, even.
Think the church from November Rain, only much bigger. We swoop in and see A LARGE SIGN: “AMERICA IS DOOMED”, Inflammatory slogans appear on smaller POSTERS all over.
From everything I can find online, the Church of the Saviour is some kind of hate group. You inside now?
The rally has begun. The CHURCH LEADER, 60s, is bellowing

Watch the news! AIDS, floods, the blood of the innocent spilled... And yet there are those who doubt that this is the wrath of God?? The CONGREGATION jeer in agreement. Jack is here trying h best to blend in. He puts on his glasses and scans the ro  147 148

Our filthy Goverment condones sodomy, divorce and abortion... And yet some still doubt that this is the work of The Antichrist? INT. JACK’S HOUSE ~ NIGHT. 146 Eggsy is using Jack’s computer to check his Facebook. Pos saying “where da fuck r u???” etc. Suddenly, a WINDOW pop up: a LIVE VIDEO showing what Jack is seeing. Audio, too.

To those I say: you may not be a fag, a Jew, a nigger, or a whore who has congress out of wedlock... Jack's is looking around the room, now focussing on HIDDE CAMERAS. There are many. Then he looks back to the pulpit
